thread.title: Prog rock legends Yes want to take you on a cruise to the Bahamas
thread.title_full: Prog rock legends Yes want to take you on a cruise to the Bahamas

author: Rosemary McClure
title: Prog rock legends Yes want to take you on a cruise to the Bahamas
text:
Prog rock legends Yes want to take you on a cruise to the Bahamas Cruise to the Edge Mike Savoia / Savoia Concert & Event Photography 
Yes fans will sail from Miami on the third annual Cruise to the Edge voyage. A pre-party is included. 
Yes fans will sail from Miami on the third annual Cruise to the Edge voyage. A pre-party is included. (Mike Savoia / Savoia Concert & Event Photography) By Rosemary McClure 
Fans of the song “Owner of a Lonely Heart” can say bon voyage to loneliness this fall during a five-day, four-night fan cruise with members of the Grammy-winning rock band Yes. 
The third annual Cruise to the Edge journey, which will be aboard the Norwegian Pearl, will depart from Miami and visit Key West, Fla., and the Bahamas. The progressive rock band Marillion also will be aboard the ship, in addition to Yes band members. A pre-cruise party in Miami will proceed the event. 
Dates: Nov. 15-19
